author: kolbyml
content:
Come to terms with not understanding much. "Eth core development" is a very wide ecosystem and you will probably always feel "wow this is a big place", but treat that as an opportunity to learn.

I would read the ethereum yellow paper once, then look through all of the projects there are. After that is done pick one which shares the same synergy as you and just start small, can be as simple as 1 line. Then slowly roll a snowball. I hope that helps.
